017
018package com.github.tommyettinger.kryo.jdkgdxds;
019
020import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Kryo;
021import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Input;
022import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.io.Output;
023import com.esotericsoftware.kryo.serializers.CollectionSerializer;
024import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.FilteredIterableOrderedSet;
025import com.github.tommyettinger.ds.OrderType;
026import com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjPredicate;
027import com.github.tommyettinger.function.ObjToSameFunction;
028
029import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
030
031public class FilteredIterableOrderedSetSerializer extends CollectionSerializer<FilteredIterableOrderedSet<?, ?>> {
032
033    private static final OrderType[] ORDER_TYPES = OrderType.values();
034
035    public FilteredIterableOrderedSetSerializer() {
036        super();
037        setElementsCanBeNull(false);
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    protected void writeHeader(Kryo kryo, Output output, FilteredIterableOrderedSet<?, ?> data) {
042        ObjPredicate<?> filter = data.getFilter();
043        ObjToSameFunction<?> editor = data.getEditor();
044        if(filter == null || editor == null)
045            throw new NoSuchElementException("A FilteredIterableOrderedSet must have a non-null filter and editor to be serialized.");
046        if(kryo.getClassResolver().getRegistration(filter.getClass()) == null)
047            kryo.register(filter.getClass());
048        if(kryo.getClassResolver().getRegistration(editor.getClass()) == null)
049            kryo.register(editor.getClass());
050        kryo.writeClassAndObject(output, filter);
051        kryo.writeClassAndObject(output, editor);
052        output.writeVarInt(data.getOrderType().ordinal(), true);
053    }
054
055    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked", "rawtypes"})
056    @Override
057    protected FilteredIterableOrderedSet<?, ?> create(Kryo kryo, Input input, Class<? extends FilteredIterableOrderedSet<?, ?>> type, int size) {
058        return new FilteredIterableOrderedSet((ObjPredicate<?>)kryo.readClassAndObject(input), (ObjToSameFunction<?>) kryo.readClassAndObject(input), size, ORDER_TYPES[input.readVarInt(true)]);
059    }
060
061    @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
062    @Override
063    protected FilteredIterableOrderedSet<?, ?> createCopy(Kryo kryo, FilteredIterableOrderedSet original) {
064        return new FilteredIterableOrderedSet(original.getFilter(), original.getEditor(), original.size(), original.getLoadFactor(), original.getOrderType());
065    }
066}
